title: Pirate's hat

properties.name: description
properties.value: A Pirate's hat is a possible reward from completing hard Treasure Trails. Players who have completed Cabin Fever, and have a book o' piracy in their inventory, can pay Patchy 500 coins to attach a pirate's hat to an eye patch to create a hat eyepatch.

Item ID2651

A Pirate's hat is a possible reward from completing hard Treasure Trails. Players who have completed Cabin Fever, and have a book o' piracy in their inventory, can pay Patchy 500 coins to attach a pirate's hat to an eye patch to create a hat eyepatch.

 Attack bonuses

The female pirate hat & eye patch now sit in place with a female character's head.

The item was recoloured.
